word_mean: 灭菌，消毒：用物理方法(干燥或湿热)、化学药剂(氧化乙烯，甲醛，乙醇)、照射(紫外线，阴极射线)或机械方法(过滤)，去除或杀灭所有活微生物
绝育：任何使个人不能生殖的步骤，如阉割，输精管切除术或输卵管切除术
在规定的温度、时间条件下使物料达到商业无菌的过程。

sentence.Network_en: In some cases, a sterilization is performed through the vaginal wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些情况下，可以经阴道壁施行绝育手术。

sentence.Network_en: Sterilization by filtration is subject to one major theoretical limitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 过滤灭菌具有一个理论上的局限性.

sentence.Network_en: Sterilization is a treatment that frees the treated object of all living organisms.
sentence.Network_cn: 灭菌处理是从处理对象排除一切生活的生物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 灭菌（sterilization）：杀灭或清除传播媒介上一切微生物的处理。消毒（disinfection）：杀灭或清除传播媒介上病原微生物，使其达 …

①不孕(sterility):指没有受孕能力,即育龄夫妇长期同居,性生活正常,未避孕而未能怀孕,是由于精子或(和)卵子的异常,或生殖道的障碍.

entry.def: If you sterilize a thing or a place, you make it completely clean and free from germs.

example.ex: Sulphur is also used to sterilize equipment...
example.tran: 硫也可用来给器材消毒。

example.ex: The milk was sterilized and sealed in bottles.
example.tran: 牛奶经过灭菌处理后被封装在瓶子里。

entry.def: If a person or an animal is sterilized, they have a medical operation that makes it impossible for them to have or produce babies.

example.ex: My wife was sterilized after the birth of her fourth child.
example.tran: 我妻子生完第4个孩子后做了绝育手术。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of making an organism barren or infertile (unable to reproduce)
2. the procedure of making some object free of live bacteria or other microorganisms (usually by heat or chemical means)

auth_sentence.content: There is a very small chance of becoming pregnant after having fallopian tube sterilization.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a very small chance of becoming pregnant after having fallopian tube sterilization.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a very small chance of becoming pregnant after having fallopian tube sterilization.

auth_sentence.content: When nappies are...washed at home, there is no sterilization and some of the bacteria...stay alive.
auth_sentence.res_content: When nappies are...washed at home, there is no sterilization and some of the bacteria...stay alive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When nappies are...washed at home, there is no sterilization and some of the bacteria...stay alive.

auth_sentence.content: From DNA damage to sterilization, any surviving microbes would be unlikely to successfully reproduce.
auth_sentence.res_content: From DNA damage to sterilization, any surviving microbes would be unlikely to successfully reproduce.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From DNA damage to sterilization, any surviving microbes would be unlikely to successfully reproduce.
